paragraphs.cht: 病人出現胸痛，持續兩小時，伴隨呼吸困難和頭暈。
paragraphs.eng: Patient presented with chest pain lasting for two hours, along with shortness of breath and dizziness.

paragraphs.cht: 因昏厥事件被收治觀察，心電圖顯示異常結果。.
paragraphs.eng: Admitted for observation after an episode of syncope; ECG showed abnormal results.

paragraphs.cht: 血液檢查顯示白血球數偏高，且血紅素水平偏低。.
paragraphs.eng: Blood test showed elevated white blood cell count and low hemoglobin levels.
